about_the_game:
The Dating your commander DLC contains the following:

Unlocks Monique Lingerie Costume
(needs to be bought with LewdCoins)
250k Gold
2500 Purple Matter
500 Flowers (Dating Gift)
500 Chocolates (Dating Gift)
500 Knives (Dating Gift)
1000 LewdCoins


- Starts the DatingYourCommander Generator in the Lab.
- Increases FreeSpins in gambling from 2(free) to 6(DLC).
- 6(free) to 12(DLC) when Monique is above level 10).

DLC can be claimed in-game once bought. Please restart the game if you are not able to claim it.
DLC can be claimed once per savegame. You can claim it again if you start a new save game or reset your game.

Thank you for your support!
